Arrangement.text:
Intro: [G Bm G Bm Em C G Bm]
Verse 1: I lift my e[G]yes to see Your f[Bm]ace I know my h[G]elp is in Your N[Bm]ame In everyt[Em]hing Held by ha[C]nds Of mercy [G Bm]
Verse 2: And I will r[G]un and not grow w[Bm]eary I will r[G]ise in God my str[Bm]ength My heart will t[Em]rust For all my h[C]ope Is Christ alo[G]ne [Bm ]
Chorus: Now my s[G]oul sings Your love it knows no e[D]nd Your love it knows no e[C]nd Your love it knows no e[G]nd [D/F# G Bm G Bm] ([G D/F# (to Chorus / Bridge)]
Verse 3: I will l[G]ove for You have l[Bm]oved I will for[G]give as You for[Bm]give Your love pre[Em]vails You fill my [C]life With hope ag[G]ain [Bm]
{new_page} Bridge: [C] You reign for[Em]ever [G] You reign for[D]ever [C] You are the l[Em]ight unto this w[D]orld
Chorus: Now my s[G]oul sings Your love it knows no e[D]nd Your love it knows no e[C]nd Your love it knows no e[G]nd [D] ([(G D C (Last time)]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 i lift my eyes to see your face i know my help is in your name in everything held by hands of mercy verse 2 and i will run and not grow weary i will rise in god my strength my heart will trust for all my hope is christ alone chorus now my soul sings your love it knows no end your love it knows no end your love it knows no end verse 3 i will love for you have loved i will forgive as you forgive your love prevails you fill my life with hope again bridge you reign forever you reign forever you are the light unto this world chorus now my soul sings your love it knows no end your love it knows no end your love it knows no end
